channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Bitcoin ‘under siege’ by BRC-20 coins as fees soar, claims analyst
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Martin Young
item.description: Bitcoin transactions and fees are at high levels, and 400,000 of them are still unconfirmed on the blockchain.

item.title: War of words: OKX takes a subtle jab at Coinbase in new ad campaign
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Felix Ng
item.description: Crypto exchange OKX included a subtle shot at Coinbase in a new global ad campaign titled “The System Needs a Rewrite.”

item.title: Bear market pushes crypto events to cut fluff, prioritize discourse
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.description: “Huge DJs” no longer appear at crypto events; instead, attendees are seeing more “well thought out, intelligent questions” being asked.

item.title: Epic CEO mocks ‘metaverse is dead’ notion — 600M coming to the ‘wake’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Felix Ng
item.description: Epic Games CEO Tim Sweeney made fun of a recent Business Insider article suggesting the metaverse had run its course.

item.title: Grayscale expands ETF business, puts forward 3 new crypto funds
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: The new funds would invest in a wide range of different crypto-related assets including Bitcoin miners and privacy tech.

item.title: Marathon Digital announces immersion crypto mining operations in Abu Dhabi
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The mining firm expects the two facilities to be online by 2024 and produce a combined hash rate of roughly 7 EH/s.

item.title: ChatGPT and other AIs could play a big role in driving more users to crypto
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Harsh Rajat
item.description: By doing things such as helping users find answers to their questions by looking at their wallets, AI could help introduce millions of new people to blockchain.

item.title: Shaquille O’Neal claims process servers 'tossed' FTX legal papers at his moving car
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The NBA star appeared in a June 2022 commercial saying he was “all in” on FTX, one of many endorsements that led to a class-action lawsuit following the exchange’s collapse.

item.title: BoE fintech head says crypto doesn’t ‘fulfill any of the functions of money’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: At a recent event, Tom Mutton, the Bank of England’s head of fintech, touted the privacy benefits of CBDCs while denouncing the anonymity of cryptocurrencies.

item.title: 5 ways AI is helping to improve customer service in e-commerce
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alice Ivey
item.description: AI is transforming e-commerce customer service through chatbots, personalized recommendations, voice assistants, fraud detection and image recognition.

item.title: BRC-20 tokens surpass $1B market cap as wallet providers prepare integration
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: The growth in BRC-20 tokens comes just two months after the creation of the Bitcoin token fungibility protocol.

item.title: OKX just sent $60M in USDT, MASK token to Alameda Research
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The fund transfer may be part of a recovery effort to repay creditors of the failed FTX crypto exchange.

item.title: Bitcoin traders offer downside targets as BTC price risks sub-$25K dip
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: It’s increasingly hard to find a bullish voice when it comes to short-term BTC price action.

item.title: Bankrupt crypto exchange QuadrigaCX to start ‘interim distribution’ of funds
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: Despite their best efforts, bankruptcy trustees have only managed to recover a fraction of the $160 million owed to creditors.

item.title: What is explainable AI (XAI)?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alexandra Overgaag
item.description: Learn about artificial intelligence, its transparency challenges, and how explainable AI increases accountability and interpretability.

item.title: Former Coinbase product manager behind insider trading case sentenced to 2 years in prison
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Ishan Wahi must surrender by June 21 to serve his sentence at the Fort Dix Federal Correctional Institution in New Jersey.

item.title: PayPal’s crypto holdings increased by 56% in Q1 2023 to nearly $1B
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: The lion’s share of the fintech’s held cryptocurrency assets lies in BTC and ETH with $499 million and $362 million, respectively — up more than 56% since Q4 2022.

item.title: 12 factors VCs should focus on when vetting crypto and blockchain companies
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph Innovation Circle
item.description: Due diligence when vetting crypto and blockchain companies comprises considering both traditional business factors and unique imperatives.

item.title: How low can the Bitcoin price go?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.description: Bitcoin is down for the fourth consecutive day to paint a bearish technical pattern that's hinting at BTC price going below $25,000.

item.title: Bitcoin priced on Binance​.US crypto exchange at $700 premium
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: The highest intraday price of Bitcoin on Binance.US reached as much as $28,600, while the intraday market price high amounted to $28,000.

item.title: Microsoft, Goldman Sachs, others partner in new blockchain network
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: The Canton blockchain network for financial institutions is being launched by Digital Asset and a group of firms, including Microsoft, Goldman and Deloitte.

item.title: $3.4B of Bitcoin in a popcorn tin: The Silk Road hacker’s story
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Elias Ahonen
item.description: The Silk Road hacker lived the high life for a decade with his stolen billions — but was caught due to a transfer of pocket change.

item.title: Private equity tokens aim to bring greater liquidity, transparency and accessibility
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Shiraz Jagati
item.description: Despite a few reservations, tokenization stands to streamline the way retail and institutional investors can access the private equity market.

item.title: What does generative AI mean for Web3?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Vinita Rathi
item.description: As AI technology evolves with time, we could expect a disruptive future in the Web3 industry.

item.title: 4 ways to supercharge your GameFi project
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Wolfgang Rückerl
item.description: With billions of gamers active around the globe, the total addressable market for blockchain gaming projects is massive.

item.title: Bitcoin fee spike spurs shift to Lightning Network — Binance and Coinbase line up
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Joe Hall
item.description: Binance announces plans to embrace the Lightning Network. Which large crypto exchanges are Lightning ready, and which are yet to be struck?

item.title: 32% of home offices invest in digital assets — Goldman Sachs
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By David Attlee
item.description: While the interest in crypto investments was rising last year among home offices, 2023 saw a massive decline in investors’ certainty about the digital assets market.

item.title: How to send and receive payments on the Lightning Network
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Emi Lacapra
item.description: Learn to use Lightning Network by setting up a wallet, funding it, and using it to make and receive payments.

item.title: Warren Buffett dumps $13.3B in stocks — A warning sign for Bitcoin and risk assets?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.description: The “Oracle of Omaha” has increased Berkshire Hathaway’s cash holdings by $2 billion in Q1, signaling his decreasing confidence in risk assets.

item.title: Coinbase legal chief sends letter to SEC on RIA rulemaking
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: Coinbase’s chief legal officer requests revisions to the SEC’s RIA custody rule to safeguard all asset classes, including cryptocurrencies, criticizing the rule for unfairly targeting crypto.
